pddl4j.exp
Interface Literal

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, Exp, InitEl, java.lang.Iterable<Term>, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AtomicFormula, NotAtomicFormula, TimedLiteral
public interface Literal
extends InitEl, java.lang.Iterable<Term>

This interface defines a literal in the PDDL language.

Method Summary

          Adds a new term to this literal.
